Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: In this case I think the most important reason for me is GenAl can be available all the time but I am unable to get in touch with my teachers whenever I need help or advice .

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: In this case of course the teacher's feedback is more trustworthy for me and I have better feeling ,

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: I think both sources of feedback have their own strengths, of course the teacher feedback is more personalized, empathetic and also relevant , but GenAl feedback is fast and consistent. In my sense maybe ideally combining both can enhance our understanding and skills.
